tp:docstring.p: A sidecar interface providing an XMPP console.

arg.name: Type
arg.tp:docstring: The type of IQ request to send; either "get" or "set".

arg.name: To
arg.tp:docstring: The recipient for the IQ; or the empty string to send an IQ to the server (with no recipient specified).

arg.name: Body
arg.tp:docstring: An XML fragment for the body of the IQ, which MUST have exactly one top-level element.

arg.name: Reply_Type
arg.tp:docstring: The type of IQ reply; either "result" or "error".

arg.name: Body
arg.tp:docstring: An XML fragment for the body of the response, which MUST have between zero and two top-level elements (the query element, an error element, both, or neither).

signal.name: StanzaSent
signal.tp:docstring: Emitted whenever a stanza is sent and SpewStanzas is True.

signal.name: StanzaReceived
signal.tp:docstring: Emitted whenever a stanza is received and SpewStanzas is True.

property.name: SpewStanzas
property.tp:docstring: If True, StanzaReceived and StanzaSent will be emitted, drowning your session bus in a sea of XML.
